item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0431; 08:40AM; 646 N Sierra Bonita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OTsR6a; #Fairfax; 40 Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a tree fire that had extended into a one-story detached garage on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E52 E82 RA27 RA52 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire Knockdown - 06/28/2022 INC#1736

item.description: Update Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1736; 10:11PM; 10412 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u9vdpr; #VermontVista; Address Corrected from W 104th Pl to 10412 S Figueroa St. 72 LAFD Firefighters took just 33 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire on two floors of a two story apartment building. Three civilians (unknown age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances) have been taken by LAFD ambulance to an area hospital. No firefighter injuries. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC4 CM22 E205 E21 E215 E221 E233 E264 E5 E57 E64 E65 E66 EM13 HR3 RA264 RA266 RA33 RA66 RA864 SQ21 T15 T21 T33 T5 T64 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14 17; Brian Humphrey

PRELIM: Two story apartment building with fire on both floors; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC4 CM22 E205 E21 E215 E221 E233 E264 E5 E57 E64 E66 EM13 HR3 RA264 RA266 RA33 RA66 T15 T21 T33 T5 T64 UR5 UR88 ; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0970; 02:00PM; EB 210 Fwy east of Sunland Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUcvff; #Sunland; PRELIM: As many as 3 vehicles involved, including a Vehicle vs. Semi, with one person trapped. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP Altadena (Log# 1448); FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E24 E274 RA74 T74; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0190; 04:31AM; 22125 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xUFG9g; #WestHills; 55 LAFD Firefighters took just 32 minutes (5:03 AM) to isolate and fully extinguish fire within a laundry room at a one-story skilled nursing facility. Twenty of the ninety patients were safely evacuated in their beds outdoors to be closely attended by nursing staff, while the others were safely sheltered in place within the facility, as smoke was effectively isolated by the building's room and sectional fire doors. None of the patients or staff have medical complaints related to the fire. Firefighters are using high-powered portable fans to further clear residual smoke, to allow all patients and staff to soon be rehoused. The fire's cause is under investigation.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 CM42 E104 E106 E107 E273 E293 E296 E305 E73 E84 EM17 RA104 RA105 RA106 RA896 RA96 T105 T73 T93 T96; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#2012; 11:09PM; NB 405 Fwy south of Skirball Center Drive; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jxvv4y; #Brentwood; PRELIM: Three vehicle traffic collision (pickup truck, overturned big rig and another big rig). Unknown cargo. No fire. At least two patients. Debris in lanes. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP West LA (Log #3060).; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; E19 E237 E71 RA19 T37; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1494; 06:03PM; 310 N Newland St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u69gHP; #HighlandPark; 32 Firefighters took just 27 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames within a *two-story* Craftsman-style home. Fire was prevented from extending to the adjacent garage. One adult female resident was evaluated for minor medical complaints and released at the scene. She will be displaced by the fire, the cause of which remains under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E201 E203 E212 E42 E55 RA12 T1 T12 T3; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1494; 05:36PM; 310 N Newland St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u69gHP; #HighlandPark; PRELIM: 1 story Craftsman-style home with fire to the rear, threatening an adjacent garage.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E201 E212 E55 RA12 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#0960; 12:50PM; 19300 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y1iYfx; #Reseda; PRELIM: LAFD EMS Captain responding to an emergency was involved in a three vehicle collision. No civilian injury. LAFD Captain will be transported to an area hospital for clinical evaluation of non-life threatening injury.
